subject: Fwd: No acknowledgement card message notification
preview: Fwd: No acknowledgement card message notification

full_threads.body:
Thanks guys



Petricia Augustus


Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467


paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au


Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi All,


Have just tested the acknowledgement card messaging by making a donation and everything is back to normality.


Thank you all for getting the process back to normal.


Thanks again


Neil

Oh I see. Brilliant thanks so much.


Neil deals with this so I will let him test it and make sure it’s all ok.


Thanks again


Cheers


Trish



Petricia Augustus


Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467


paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au


Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

Hi Trish, 


All good, we had it setup to send a notification to enquiries@ when the user donating added a "personal message". If this was left blank, then the notification would not be sent. This is now setup to send regardless of if they add personal message or not. The "Would you like us to notify..." triggers the notifications now.  I hope that clarifies? 


Thanks and speak soon,

Hi Heath


I’m thinking we may have some mixed messages and apologies if that was my fault. Attached is a copy of the notification emails that we have been receiving from the site when someone nominations to donate in memory or in honour of someone.


For some reason these emails have stopped.


From my understanding they were definitely set up and we did receive them but it has stopped.


Thanks so much for looking into it and yes we would like the emails to be sent to enquiries@msra.org.au


Thanks


Trish



Petricia Augustus


Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations


MS Research Australia


02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467


paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au


Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060
Heath Maguire all good now. I just updated the acknowledgement conditional on gravityforms.

Hi Trish, 


This notification wasn't actually setup? We have scheduled to add it to the site this evening, so it will be ready to go by the morning. To confirm, if someone chooses to send an acknowledgement card, we will send an email notification to enquiries@msra.org.au. 


Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271

https://wolfiq.com.au/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/wolfiq-wpperk-signature-2018.png


Begin forwarded message:

Cc: Patrick Foong <pfoong@msra.org.au>


Hi Heath

Wondering if this issue might be related to the issue we had last week with the Kiss site?

Thanks

Trish

Petricia Augustus

Head of Communications, Marketing and Operations

MS Research Australia

02 8413 7910 • 1300 356 467

paugustus@msra.org.au • www.msra.org.au

Level 19 Northpoint • 100 Miller Street • North Sydney NSW 2060

From: Neil Robertson
Sent: Monday, 16 April 2018 1:15 PM
To: heath@wolfiq.com.au
Cc: Petricia Augustus <paugustus@msra.org.au>; Patrick Foong <pfoong@msra.org.au>
Subject: No acknowledgement card message notification

Hi Heath,

Can you please investigate an issue that occurred on Friday 13th with a donation on the MS Research Australia site that looks as though the donor requested an acknowledgement card be sent in memory of a deceased friend.

There was no Email sent through to the enquiries@msra.org.au giving us notification of the donors wish to have a card sent.

I only discovered this when I looked at the online web donations spread sheet that the accounts department downloads for any online donations.

I know this happened once before and you were able to fix it.

Thanks in advance,

Neil

Neil Robertson

Relationship & Planned Giving Coordinator
